targets.expr: max by(device, model_family, model_name, serial_number, form_factor, protocol, firmware_version, interface) (last_over_time(smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance", device=~"$device"}[$__range]))

sum by(device) (last_over_time(smartctl_device_bytes_written{instance=~"$instance", device=~"$device"}[$__range]))
or
sum by(device) (last_over_time(smartctl_device_attribute{instance=~"$instance", device=~"$device", attribute_name="Total_LBAs_Written", attribute_value_type="raw"}[$__range])) * 512

sum by(device) (last_over_time(smartctl_device_bytes_read{instance=~"$instance", device=~"$device"}[$__range]))
or
sum by(device) (last_over_time(smartctl_device_attribute{instance=~"$instance", device=~"$device", attribute_name="Total_LBAs_Read", attribute_value_type="raw"}[$__range])) * 512

panels.description: Contains the number of Error Information log entries over the life of the controller

targets.expr: sum by(model_name, device, instance) ((smartctl_device_num_err_log_entries{instance=~"$instance",job="$job"}) * on(device, instance) group_left(model_name) (smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",serial_number=~"$serial_number"}))

panels.title: Number of error log entries

targets.expr: sum by(model_name, device, instance) ((smartctl_device_critical_warning{instance=~"$instance",job="$job"}) * on(device, instance) group_left(model_name) (smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",serial_number=~"$serial_number"}))

panels.title: Critical warnings for state of controller

targets.expr: sum by(model_name, device, instance) ((smartctl_device_smartctl_exit_status{instance=~"$instance",job="$job"}) * on(device, instance) group_left(model_name) (smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",serial_number=~"$serial_number"}))

panels.description: Normalized percentage (0 to 100%) of the remaining spare capacity available

targets.expr: sum by(model_name, device, instance) ((smartctl_device_available_spare{instance=~"$instance",job="$job"}) * on(device, instance) group_left(model_name) (smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",serial_number=~"$serial_number"}))

panels.title: Available spare

targets.expr: sum by(model_name, device, instance) ((smartctl_device_error_log_count{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",error_log_type="summary"}) * on(device, instance) group_left(model_name) (smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",serial_number=~"$serial_number"}))

panels.description: When the Available Spare falls below the threshold indicated in this field, an asynchronous event completion may occur. The value is indicated as a normalized percentage (0 to 100%)

targets.expr: sum by(model_name, device, instance) ((smartctl_device_available_spare_threshold{instance=~"$instance",job="$job"}) * on(device, instance) group_left(model_name) (smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",serial_number=~"$serial_number"}))

panels.title: Available spare threshold

targets.expr:
max by(device) (rate(smartctl_device_bytes_written{instance=~"$instance", device=~"$device"}[$__rate_interval]))
or
sum by(device) (rate(smartctl_device_attribute{instance=~"$instance", device=~"$device", attribute_name="Total_LBAs_Written", attribute_value_type="raw"}[$__rate_interval])) * 512

panels.description: Contains the number of occurrences where the controller detected an unrecovered data integrity error. Errors such as uncorrectable ECC, CRC checksum failure, or LBA tag mismatch are included in this field

targets.expr: sum by(model_name, device, instance) ((smartctl_device_media_errors{instance=~"$instance",job="$job"}) * on(device, instance) group_left(model_name) (smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",serial_number=~"$serial_number"}))

panels.title: Number of media errors

targets.expr:
max by(device) (rate(smartctl_device_bytes_read{instance=~"$instance", device=~"$device"}[$__rate_interval]))
or
max by(device) (rate(smartctl_device_attribute{instance=~"$instance", device=~"$device", attribute_name="Total_LBAs_Read", attribute_value_type="raw"}[$__rate_interval])) * 512

list.definition: query_result(sum by(device) (last_over_time(smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance", serial_number=~"$serial_number"}[$__range])) or sum by(device) (last_over_time(smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance", serial_number=""}[$__range])))
list.name: device

query.query: query_result(sum by(device) (last_over_time(smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance", serial_number=~"$serial_number"}[$__range])) or sum by(device) (last_over_time(smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance", serial_number=""}[$__range])))
